title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-5.7 - Annual reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-5.7 - Annual reporting

State Regulations

No later than March 31st of each year, each health
insurer and HIMP agent participating in this program shall send a report to the

Chair indicating the total amount of reimbursement requested and recovered, the
total number of HIMP-1 forms submitted for reimbursement, the total number of
requests for arbitration submitted in the prior calendar year as a result of
this program, identifying the number of requests for a desk arbitration and the
number of requests for an oral hearing, and including the number of
arbitrations resolved in favor of the health insurer. Each health insurer and
HIMP agent shall report the name of each medical provider for which it has
discovered duplicate payment made by the health insurer and the carrier and the
number of such duplicate payments made in the prior calendar
year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-5.7

Adopted

New

York State Register April 6, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 14, eff. 6/1/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
